286.Outline: A young boy embarks on a magical adventure to the North Pole on the Polar Express. During his adventure he learns about friendship, bravery, and the spirit of Christmas.

287.Name: Underworld: Rise of the Lycans
287.Credit: Dir: Patrick Tatopoulos With: Rhona Mitra, Michael Sheen, Bill Nighy
287.Outline: An origins story centered on the centuries-old feud between the race of aristocratic vampires and their onetime slaves, the Lycans.

288.Name: Addams Family Values
288.Credit: Dir: Barry Sonnenfeld With: Anjelica Huston, Raul Julia, Christopher Lloyd
288.Outline: A comical Gothic horror-movie-type family tries to rescue their beloved uncle from his gold-digging new love.

289.Name: Asterix and Obelix Meet Cleopatra
289.Credit: Dir: Alain Chabat With: GÃ©rard Depardieu, Christian Clavier, Jamel Debbouze
289.Outline: AstÃ©rix and ObÃ©lix go to Egypt to help architect NumÃ©robis who is building a palace for Cleopatra.

290.Name: Insidious: Chapter 2
290.Credit: Dir: James Wan With: Patrick Wilson, Rose Byrne, Barbara Hershey
290.Outline: The Lamberts believe that they have defeated the spirits that have haunted their family, but they soon discover that evil is not beaten so easily.

291.Name: What Lies Beneath
291.Credit: Dir: Robert Zemeckis With: Harrison Ford, Michelle Pfeiffer, Katharine Towne
291.Outline: The wife of a university research scientist believes that her lakeside Vermont home is haunted by a ghost - or that she is losing her mind.

292.Name: The Spiderwick Chronicles
292.Credit: Dir: Mark Waters With: Freddie Highmore, Sarah Bolger, David Strathairn
292.Outline: Upon moving into the run-down Spiderwick Estate with their mother, twin brothers Jared and Simon Grace, along with their sister Mallory, find themselves pulled into an alternate world full of faeries and other creatures.

293.Name: The Chronicles of Narnia: Prince Caspian
293.Credit: Dir: Andrew Adamson With: Ben Barnes, Skandar Keynes, Georgie Henley
293.Outline: The Pevensie siblings return to Narnia, where they are enlisted to once again help ward off an evil king and restore the rightful heir to the land's throne, Prince Caspian.

294.Name: Tideland
294.Credit: Dir: Terry Gilliam With: Jeff Bridges, Jennifer Tilly, Jodelle Ferland
294.Outline: Because of the actions of her irresponsible parents, a young girl is left alone on a decrepit country estate and survives inside her fantastic imagination.

295.Name: Nanny McPhee
295.Credit: Dir: Kirk Jones With: Emma Thompson, Colin Firth, Angela Lansbury
295.Outline: Emma Thompson stars as a governess who uses magic to rein in the behavior of seven ne'er-do-well children in her charge.

296.Name: Pet Sematary
296.Credit: Dir: Mary Lambert With: Dale Midkiff, Denise Crosby, Fred Gwynne
296.Outline: Behind a young family's home in Maine is a terrible secret that holds the power of life after death. When tragedy strikes, the threat of that power soon becomes undeniable.

297.Name: A Nightmare on Elm Street 3: Dream Warriors
297.Credit: Dir: Chuck Russell With: Heather Langenkamp, Robert Englund, Craig Wasson
297.Outline: Survivors of undead serial killer Freddy Krueger - who stalks his victims in their dreams - learn to take control of their own dreams in order to fight back.

298.Name: Day Watch
298.Credit: Dir: Timur Bekmambetov With: Konstantin Khabenskiy, Mariya Poroshina, Vladimir Menshov
298.Outline: A man who serves in the war between the forces of Light and Dark comes into possession of a device that can restore life to Moscow, which was nearly destroyed by an apocalyptic event.

299.Name: Byzantium
299.Credit: Dir: Neil Jordan With: Saoirse Ronan, Gemma Arterton, Sam Riley
299.Outline: Residents of a coastal town learn, with deathly consequences, the secret shared by the two mysterious women who have sought shelter at a local resort.

300.Name: Candyman
300.Credit: Dir: Bernard Rose With: Virginia Madsen, Xander Berkeley, Tony Todd
300.Outline: The Candyman, a murderous soul with a hook for a hand, is accidentally summoned to reality by a skeptic grad student researching the monster's myth.

301.Name: Child's Play
301.Credit: Dir: Tom Holland With: Catherine Hicks, Chris Sarandon, Alex Vincent
301.Outline: A single mother gives her son a much sought after doll for his birthday, only to discover that it is possessed by the soul of a serial killer.

302.Name: Ghostbusters II
302.Credit: Dir: Ivan Reitman With: Bill Murray, Dan Aykroyd, Sigourney Weaver
302.Outline: The discovery of a massive river of ectoplasm and a resurgence of spectral activity allows the staff of Ghostbusters to revive the business.

303.Name: Star Wars: Episode I - The Phantom Menace
303.Credit: Dir: George Lucas With: Ewan McGregor, Liam Neeson, Natalie Portman
303.Outline: Two Jedi Knights escape a hostile blockade to find allies and come across a young boy who may bring balance to the Force, but the long dormant Sith resurface to reclaim their old glory.

304.Name: Horns
304.Credit: Dir: Alexandre Aja With: Daniel Radcliffe, Juno Temple, Max Minghella
304.Outline: In the aftermath of his girlfriend's mysterious death, a young man awakens to find strange horns sprouting from his temples.

305.Name: City of Ember
305.Credit: Dir: Gil Kenan With: Saoirse Ronan, Toby Jones, Bill Murray
305.Outline: For generations, the people of the City of Ember have flourished in an amazing world of glittering lights. But Ember's once powerful generator is failing ... and the great lamps that illuminate the city are starting to flicker.

306.Name: The Witches of Eastwick
306.Credit: Dir: George Miller With: Jack Nicholson, Cher, Susan Sarandon
306.Outline: Three single women in a picturesque village have their wishes granted - at a cost - when a mysterious and flamboyant man arrives in their lives.

307.Name: Night Watch
307.Credit: Dir: Timur Bekmambetov With: Konstantin Khabenskiy, Vladimir Menshov, Mariya Poroshina
307.Outline: A fantasy-thriller set in present-day Moscow where the respective forces that control daytime and nighttime do battle.

308.Name: Alice in Wonderland
308.Credit: Dir: Tim Burton With: Mia Wasikowska, Johnny Depp, Helena Bonham Carter
308.Outline: Nineteen-year-old Alice returns to the magical world from her childhood adventure, where she reunites with her old friends and learns of her true destiny: to end the Red Queen's reign of terror.

309.Name: The Water Horse
309.Credit: Dir: Jay Russell With: Emily Watson, David Morrissey, Alex Etel
309.Outline: A lonely boy discovers a mysterious egg that hatches a sea creature of Scottish legend.

310.Name: Hereafter
310.Credit: Dir: Clint Eastwood With: Matt Damon, CÃ©cile De France, Bryce Dallas Howard
310.Outline: A drama centered on three people -- a blue-collar American, a French journalist and a London school boy -- who are touched by death in different ways.

311.Name: Evil Dead
311.Credit: Dir: Fede Alvarez With: Jane Levy, Shiloh Fernandez, Jessica Lucas
311.Outline: Five friends head to a remote cabin, where the discovery of a Book of the Dead leads them to unwittingly summon up demons living in the nearby woods.

312.Name: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs 2
312.Credit: Dir: Cody Cameron, Kris Pearn With: Bill Hader, Anna Faris, Will Forte
312.Outline: Flint Lockwood now works at The Live Corp Company for his idol Chester V. But he's forced to leave his post when he learns that his most infamous machine is still operational and is churning out menacing food-animal hybrids.

313.Name: Legend
313.Credit: Dir: Ridley Scott With: Tom Cruise, Mia Sara, Tim Curry
313.Outline: A young man must stop the Lord of Darkness from both destroying daylight and marrying the woman he loves.

314.Name: The Lorax
314.Credit: Dir: Chris Renaud, Kyle Balda With: Zac Efron, Taylor Swift, Danny DeVito
314.Outline: A 12-year-old boy searches for the one thing that will enable him to win the affection of the girl of his dreams. To find it he must discover the story of the Lorax, the grumpy yet charming creature who fights to protect his world.

315.Name: Charlie St. Cloud
315.Credit: Dir: Burr Steers With: Zac Efron, Kim Basinger, Charlie Tahan
315.Outline: Charlie's brother, Sam dies in a car crash that Charlie survives. Charlie is given the gift of seeing his dead brother but when the girl he fell in love with's life is at risk he must choose between his girlfriend and his brother.

316.Name: The Woman in Black
316.Credit: Dir: James Watkins With: Daniel Radcliffe, Janet McTeer, CiarÃ¡n Hinds
316.Outline: A young lawyer travels to a remote village where he discovers the vengeful ghost of a scorned woman is terrorizing the locals.

317.Name: Hancock
317.Credit: Dir: Peter Berg With: Will Smith, Charlize Theron, Jason Bateman
317.Outline: Hancock is a superhero whose ill considered behavior regularly causes damage in the millions. He changes when one person he saves helps him improve his public image.

318.Name: New Nightmare
318.Credit: Dir: Wes Craven With: Heather Langenkamp, Robert Englund, Jeff Davis
318.Outline: A demonic force has chosen Freddy Krueger as its portal to the real world. Can Heather play the part of Nancy one last time and trap the evil trying to enter our world?

319.Name: Final Fantasy: The Spirits Within
319.Genre: Animation | Action | Adventure | Fantasy | Romance | Sci-Fi
319.Credit: Dir: Hironobu Sakaguchi, Motonori Sakakibara With: Alec Baldwin, Steve Buscemi, Ming-Na Wen
319.Outline: A scientist makes a last stand on Earth with the help of a ragtag team of soldiers against an invasion of alien phantoms.

320.Name: DragonHeart
320.Credit: Dir: Rob Cohen With: Dennis Quaid, Sean Connery, Dina Meyer
320.Outline: The last dragon and a disillusioned dragonslaying knight must cooperate to stop an evil king who was given partial immortality.

321.Name: The Nines
321.Credit: Dir: John August With: Ryan Reynolds, Hope Davis, Melissa McCarthy
321.Outline: A troubled actor, a television show runner, and an acclaimed videogame designer find their lives intertwining in mysterious and unsettling ways.

322.Name: A Life Less Ordinary
322.Credit: Dir: Danny Boyle With: Cameron Diaz, Ewan McGregor, Holly Hunter
322.Outline: Ewan McGregor stars as a cleaning man in L.A. who takes his boss' daughter hostage after being fired and replaced by a robot...

323.Name: Click
323.Credit: Dir: Frank Coraci With: Adam Sandler, Kate Beckinsale, Christopher Walken
323.Outline: A workaholic architect finds a universal remote that allows him to fast-forward and rewind to different parts of his life. Complications arise when the remote starts to overrule his choices.

324.Name: Death Becomes Her
324.Credit: Dir: Robert Zemeckis With: Meryl Streep, Bruce Willis, Goldie Hawn
324.Outline: When a woman learns of an immortality treatment, she sees it as a way to outdo her long-time rival.

325.Name: Underworld: Awakening
325.Credit: Dir: MÃ¥ns MÃ¥rlind, BjÃ¶rn Stein With: Kate Beckinsale, Michael Ealy, India Eisley
325.Outline: When human forces discover the existence of the Vampire and Lycan clans, a war to eradicate both species commences. The vampire warrior Selene leads the battle against humankind.

326.Name: Phenomenon
326.Credit: Dir: Jon Turteltaub With: John Travolta, Kyra Sedgwick, Forest Whitaker
326.Outline: An ordinary man sees a bright light descend from the sky, and discovers he now has super-intelligence and telekinesis.

327.Name: Darkman
327.Credit: Dir: Sam Raimi With: Liam Neeson, Frances McDormand, Colin Friels
327.Outline: A brilliant scientist left for dead returns to exact revenge on the people who burned him alive.

328.Name: Upside Down
328.Credit: Dir: Juan Solanas With: Jim Sturgess, Kirsten Dunst, Timothy Spall
328.Outline: Adam and Eden fell in love as teens despite the fact that they live on twinned worlds with gravities that pull in opposite directions. Ten years after a forced separation, Adam sets out on a dangerous quest to reconnect with his love.

329.Name: Night at the Museum
329.Credit: Dir: Shawn Levy With: Ben Stiller, Carla Gugino, Ricky Gervais
329.Outline: A newly recruited night security guard at the Museum of Natural History discovers that an ancient curse causes the animals and exhibits on display to come to life and wreak havoc.

330.Name: What Women Want
330.Credit: Dir: Nancy Meyers With: Mel Gibson, Helen Hunt, Marisa Tomei
330.Outline: After an accident, a chauvenistic executive gains the ability to hear what women are really thinking.

331.Name: Goosebumps
331.Credit: Dir: Rob Letterman With: Jack Black, Dylan Minnette, Odeya Rush
331.Outline: A teenager teams up with the daughter of young adult horror author R. L. Stine after the writer's imaginary demons are set free on the town of Madison, Delaware.

332.Name: 17 Again
332.Credit: Dir: Burr Steers With: Zac Efron, Matthew Perry, Leslie Mann
332.Outline: Mike O' Donnell is ungrateful for how his life turned out. He gets a chance to rewrite his life when he meets a janitor near a bridge.

333.Name: Charlotte's Web
333.Credit: Dir: Gary Winick With: Dakota Fanning, Julia Roberts, Oprah Winfrey
333.Outline: Wilbur the pig is scared of the end of the season, because he knows that come that time, he will end up on the dinner table. He hatches a plan with Charlotte, a spider that lives in his pen, to ensure that this will never happen.

334.Name: The Santa Clause
334.Credit: Dir: John Pasquin With: Tim Allen, Judge Reinhold, Wendy Crewson
334.Outline: When a man inadvertantly kills Santa on Christmas Eve, he finds himself magically recruited to take his place.

335.Name: Shrek Forever After
335.Credit: Dir: Mike Mitchell With: Mike Myers, Cameron Diaz, Eddie Murphy
335.Outline: Rumpelstiltskin tricks a mid-life crisis burdened Shrek into allowing himself to be erased from existence and cast in a dark alternate timeline where Rumpel rules supreme.

336.Name: Oz the Great and Powerful
336.Credit: Dir: Sam Raimi With: James Franco, Michelle Williams, Rachel Weisz
336.Outline: A small-time magician is swept away to an enchanted land and is forced into a power struggle between three witches.

337.Name: The Invention of Lying
337.Credit: Dir: Ricky Gervais, Matthew Robinson With: Ricky Gervais, Jennifer Garner, Jonah Hill
337.Outline: A comedy set in a world where no one has ever lied, until a writer seizes the opportunity for personal gain.

338.Name: Kate & Leopold
338.Credit: Dir: James Mangold With: Meg Ryan, Hugh Jackman, Liev Schreiber
338.Outline: Kate and her actor brother live in N.Y. in the 21st Century. Her ex-boyfriend, Stuart, lives above her apartment...

339.Name: The Change-Up
339.Credit: Dir: David Dobkin With: Jason Bateman, Ryan Reynolds, Olivia Wilde
339.Outline: Dave is a married man with three kids and a loving wife, and Mitch is a single man who is at the prime of his sexual life. One fateful night while Mitch and Dave are peeing in a fountain, lightning strikes and they switch bodies.

340.Name: Arachnophobia
340.Credit: Dir: Frank Marshall With: Jeff Daniels, Julian Sands, John Goodman
340.Outline: A species of South American killer spider hitches a lift to the U.S. in a coffin and starts to breed and kill.

341.Name: It's a Boy Girl Thing
341.Credit: Dir: Nick Hurran With: Samaire Armstrong, Kevin Zegers, Sherry Miller
341.Outline: Sworn enemies find themselves in each other's bodies, and use this to ruin each other's lives.

342.Name: The Chronicles of Narnia: The Voyage of the Dawn Treader
342.Credit: Dir: Michael Apted With: Ben Barnes, Skandar Keynes, Georgie Henley
342.Outline: Lucy and Edmund Pevensie return to Narnia with their cousin Eustace where they meet up with Prince Caspian for a trip across the sea aboard the royal ship The Dawn Treader. Along the way they encounter dragons, dwarves, merfolk, and a band of lost warriors before reaching the edge of the world.

343.Name: TMNT
343.Genre: Animation | Action | Adventure | Comedy | Family | Fantasy | Sci-Fi
343.Credit: Dir: Kevin Munroe With: Patrick Stewart, Mako, Chris Evans
343.Outline: When the world is threatened by an ancient evil, the four adolescent turtles must reunite and overcome their faults in order to stand against it.

344.Name: The Mummy Returns
344.Credit: Dir: Stephen Sommers With: Brendan Fraser, Rachel Weisz, John Hannah
344.Outline: The mummified body of Imhotep is shipped to a museum in London, where he once again wakes and begins his campaign of rage and terror.

345.Name: Peggy Sue Got Married
345.Credit: Dir: Francis Ford Coppola With: Kathleen Turner, Nicolas Cage, Barry Miller
345.Outline: Peggy Sue faints at a high school reunion. When she wakes up, she finds herself in her own past, just before she finished school.

346.Name: Gremlins 2: The New Batch
346.Credit: Dir: Joe Dante With: Zach Galligan, Phoebe Cates, John Glover
346.Outline: The Gremlins are back, and this time, they've taken total control over the building of a media mogul.

347.Name: Dorian Gray
347.Credit: Dir: Oliver Parker With: Ben Barnes, Colin Firth, Rebecca Hall
347.Outline: A corrupt young man somehow keeps his youthful beauty eternally, but a special painting gradually reveals his inner ugliness to all.

348.Name: Jack the Giant Slayer
348.Credit: Dir: Bryan Singer With: Nicholas Hoult, Stanley Tucci, Ewan McGregor
348.Outline: The ancient war between humans and a race of giants is reignited when Jack, a young farmhand fighting for a kingdom and the love of a princess, opens a gateway between the two worlds.

349.Name: Ella Enchanted
349.Credit: Dir: Tommy O'Haver With: Anne Hathaway, Hugh Dancy, Cary Elwes
349.Outline: Ella is under a spell to be constantly obedient, a fact she must hide from her new step-family in order to protect the prince of the land, her friend for whom she's falling.

350.Name: Space Jam
350.Genre: Animation | Adventure | Comedy | Family | Fantasy | Sci-Fi | Sport
350.Credit: Dir: Joe Pytka With: Michael Jordan, Wayne Knight, Theresa Randle
350.Outline: Michael Jordan agrees to help the Looney Tunes play a basketball game vs. alien slavers to determine their freedom.

351.Name: Dracula Untold
351.Credit: Dir: Gary Shore With: Luke Evans, Dominic Cooper, Sarah Gadon
351.Outline: As his kingdom is being threatened by the Turks, young prince Vlad Tepes must become a monster feared by his own people in order to obtain the power needed to protect his own family, and the families of his kingdom.

352.Name: The Invisible
352.Credit: Dir: David S. Goyer With: Justin Chatwin, Margarita Levieva, Marcia Gay Harden
352.Outline: A teenager is left invisible to the living after an attack.

353.Name: 47 Ronin
353.Credit: Dir: Carl Rinsch With: Keanu Reeves, Hiroyuki Sanada, Ko Shibasaki
353.Outline: A band of samurai set out to avenge the death and dishonor of their master at the hands of a ruthless shogun.

354.Name: Beowulf
354.Credit: Dir: Robert Zemeckis With: Ray Winstone, Crispin Glover, Angelina Jolie
354.Outline: The warrior Beowulf must fight and defeat the monster Grendel who is terrorizing Denmark, and later, Grendel's mother, who begins killing out of revenge.

355.Name: 300: Rise of an Empire
355.Credit: Dir: Noam Murro With: Sullivan Stapleton, Eva Green, Lena Headey
355.Outline: Greek general Themistokles leads the charge against invading Persian forces led by mortal-turned-god Xerxes and Artemisia, vengeful commander of the Persian navy.

356.Name: Night at the Museum: Secret of the Tomb
356.Credit: Dir: Shawn Levy With: Ben Stiller, Robin Williams, Owen Wilson
356.Outline: Larry spans the globe, uniting favorite and new characters while embarking on an epic quest to save the magic before it is gone forever.

357.Name: How High
357.Credit: Dir: Jesse Dylan With: Method Man, Redman, Obba BabatundÃ©
357.Outline: Two guys by the name of Silas and Jamal decided to one day smoke something magical, which eventually helps them to ace their college entrance exam.

358.Name: The Craft
358.Credit: Dir: Andrew Fleming With: Robin Tunney, Fairuza Balk, Neve Campbell
358.Outline: A newcomer to a Catholic prep high school falls in with a trio of outcast teenage girls who practice witchcraft and they all soon conjure up various spells and curses against those who even slightly anger them.

359.Name: Mr. Magorium's Wonder Emporium
359.Credit: Dir: Zach Helm With: Natalie Portman, Dustin Hoffman, Jason Bateman
359.Outline: Molly Mahoney is the awkward and insecure manager of Mr. Magorium's Wonder Emporium, the strangest, most fantastic, most wonderful toy store in the world. But when Mr. Magorium, the 243 year-old eccentric who owns the store, bequeaths the store to her, a dark and ominous change begins to take over the once remarkable Emporium.

360.Name: Mama
360.Credit: Dir: AndrÃ©s Muschietti With: Jessica Chastain, Nikolaj Coster-Waldau, Megan Charpentier
360.Outline: Annabel and Lucas are faced with the challenge of raising his young nieces that were left alone in the forest for 5 years.... but how alone were they?

361.Name: Last Action Hero
361.Credit: Dir: John McTiernan With: Arnold Schwarzenegger, F. Murray Abraham, Art Carney
361.Outline: With the help of a magic ticket, a young film fan is transported into the fictional world of his favorite action film character.

362.Name: Dark Shadows
362.Credit: Dir: Tim Burton With: Johnny Depp, Michelle Pfeiffer, Eva Green
362.Outline: An imprisoned vampire, Barnabas Collins, is set free and returns to his ancestral home, where his dysfunctional descendants are in need of his protection.

363.Name: Splash
363.Credit: Dir: Ron Howard With: Tom Hanks, Daryl Hannah, Eugene Levy
363.Outline: A young man is reunited with a mermaid who saves him from drowning as a boy and falls in love not knowing who/what she is.

364.Name: Winter's Tale
364.Credit: Dir: Akiva Goldsman With: Colin Farrell, Jessica Brown Findlay, Russell Crowe
364.Outline: A burglar falls for an heiress as she dies in his arms. When he learns that he has the gift of reincarnation, he sets out to save her.

365.Name: Indiana Jones and the Kingdom of the Crystal Skull
365.Credit: Dir: Steven Spielberg With: Harrison Ford, Cate Blanchett, Shia LaBeouf
365.Outline: Famed archaeologist/adventurer Dr. Henry "Indiana" Jones is called back into action when he becomes entangled in a Soviet plot to uncover the secret behind mysterious artifacts known as the Crystal Skulls.

366.Name: Bill & Ted's Bogus Journey
366.Credit: Dir: Peter Hewitt With: Keanu Reeves, Alex Winter, William Sadler
366.Outline: A tyrant from the future creates evil android doubles of Bill and Ted and sends them back to eliminate the originals.

367.Name: Reign of Fire
367.Credit: Dir: Rob Bowman With: Matthew McConaughey, Christian Bale, Izabella Scorupco
367.Outline: A brood of fire-breathing dragons emerges from the earth and begins setting everything ablaze, establishing dominance over the planet.

368.Name: Beautiful Creatures
368.Credit: Dir: Richard LaGravenese With: Alice Englert, Viola Davis, Emma Thompson
368.Outline: Ethan longs to escape his small Southern town. He meets a mysterious new girl, Lena. Together, they uncover dark secrets about their respective families, their history and their town.

369.Name: The Tale of Despereaux
369.Credit: Dir: Sam Fell, Robert Stevenhagen With: Matthew Broderick, Emma Watson, Dustin Hoffman
369.Outline: The tale of three unlikely heroes - a misfit mouse who prefers reading books to eating them, an unhappy rat who schemes to leave the darkness of the dungeon, and a bumbling servant girl with cauliflower ears - whose fates are intertwined with that of the castle's princess.

370.Name: The Sorcerer's Apprentice
370.Credit: Dir: Jon Turteltaub With: Nicolas Cage, Jay Baruchel, Alfred Molina
370.Outline: Master sorcerer Balthazar Blake must find and train Merlin's descendant to defeat dark sorceress Morgana le Fey.

371.Name: The Midnight Meat Train
371.Credit: Dir: RyÃ»hei Kitamura With: Vinnie Jones, Bradley Cooper, Leslie Bibb
371.Outline: A photographer, Leon's obsessive pursuit of dark subject matter leads him into the path of a serial killer, Mahogany, the subway murderer who stalks late night commuters, ultimately butchering them in the most gruesome ways imaginable.

372.Name: Inkheart
372.Credit: Dir: Iain Softley With: Brendan Fraser, Andy Serkis, Eliza Bennett
372.Outline: A young girl discovers her father has an amazing talent to bring characters out of their books and must try to stop a freed villain from destroying them all, with the help of her father, her aunt, and a storybook's hero.

373.Name: Zathura: A Space Adventure
373.Genre: Action | Adventure | Comedy | Family | Fantasy | Sci-Fi
373.Credit: Dir: Jon Favreau With: Josh Hutcherson, Jonah Bobo, Dax Shepard
373.Outline: Two young brothers are drawn into an intergalactic adventure when their house is hurled through the depths of space by the magical board game they are playing.

374.Name: Freaky Friday
374.Credit: Dir: Mark Waters With: Jamie Lee Curtis, Lindsay Lohan, Mark Harmon
374.Outline: An overworked mother and her daughter do not get along. When they switch bodies, each is forced to adapt to the other's life for one freaky Friday.

375.Name: Snow White and the Huntsman
375.Credit: Dir: Rupert Sanders With: Kristen Stewart, Chris Hemsworth, Charlize Theron
375.Outline: In a twist to the fairy tale, the Huntsman ordered to take Snow White into the woods to be killed winds up becoming her protector and mentor in a quest to vanquish the Evil Queen.

376.Name: Insidious: Chapter 3
376.Credit: Dir: Leigh Whannell With: Dermot Mulroney, Stefanie Scott, Angus Sampson
376.Outline: A prequel set before the haunting of the Lambert family that reveals how gifted psychic Elise Rainier reluctantly agrees to use her ability to contact the dead in order to help a teenage girl who has been targeted by a dangerous supernatural entity.

377.Name: Practical Magic
377.Credit: Dir: Griffin Dunne With: Sandra Bullock, Nicole Kidman, Stockard Channing
377.Outline: The wry, comic romantic tale follows the Owens sisters, Sally and Gillian, as they struggle to use their hereditary gift for practical magic to overcome the obstacles in discovering true love.

378.Name: The Golden Compass
378.Credit: Dir: Chris Weitz With: Nicole Kidman, Daniel Craig, Dakota Blue Richards
378.Outline: In a parallel universe, young Lyra Belacqua journeys to the far North to save her best friend and other kidnapped children from terrible experiments by a mysterious organization.

379.Name: The Zero Theorem
379.Credit: Dir: Terry Gilliam With: Christoph Waltz, Lucas Hedges, MÃ©lanie Thierry
379.Outline: A hugely talented but socially isolated computer operator is tasked by Management to prove the Zero Theorem: that the universe ends as nothing, rendering life meaningless. But meaning is what he already craves.

380.Name: Hansel & Gretel: Witch Hunters
380.Credit: Dir: Tommy Wirkola With: Jeremy Renner, Gemma Arterton, Peter Stormare
380.Outline: Hansel & Gretel are bounty hunters who track and kill witches all over the world. As the fabled Blood Moon approaches, the siblings encounter a new form of evil that might hold a secret to their past.

381.Name: 13 Going on 30
381.Credit: Dir: Gary Winick With: Jennifer Garner, Mark Ruffalo, Judy Greer
381.Outline: A 13 year old girl plays a game on her 13th birthday and wakes up the next day as a 30 year old woman.

382.Name: S1m0ne
382.Credit: Dir: Andrew Niccol With: Al Pacino, Catherine Keener, Rachel Roberts
382.Outline: A producer's film is endangered when his star walks off, so he decides to digitally create an actress to substitute for the star, becoming an overnight sensation that everyone thinks is a real person.

383.Name: Bedtime Stories
383.Credit: Dir: Adam Shankman With: Adam Sandler, Keri Russell, Courteney Cox
383.Outline: A hotel handyman's life changes when the lavish bedtime stories he tells his niece and nephew start to magically come true.

384.Name: Sucker Punch
384.Credit: Dir: Zack Snyder With: Emily Browning, Vanessa Hudgens, Abbie Cornish
384.Outline: A young girl is institutionalized by her abusive stepfather. Retreating to an alternative reality as a coping strategy, she envisions a plan which will help her escape from the mental facility.

385.Name: Dragonfly
385.Credit: Dir: Tom Shadyac With: Kevin Costner, Susanna Thompson, Joe Morton
385.Outline: A grieving doctor is being contacted by his late wife through his patients near death experiences.

386.Name: Solomon Kane
386.Credit: Dir: Michael J. Bassett With: James Purefoy, Max von Sydow, Rachel Hurd-Wood
386.Outline: A ruthless mercenary renounces violence after learning his soul is bound for hell. When a young girl is kidnapped and her family slain by a sorcerer's murderous cult, he is forced to fight and seek his redemption slaying evil.

387.Name: The Kid
387.Credit: Dir: Jon Turteltaub With: Bruce Willis, Spencer Breslin, Emily Mortimer
387.Outline: An unhappy and disliked image consultant gets a second shot at life when an eight year old version of himself mysteriously appears.

388.Name: Immortals
388.Credit: Dir: Tarsem Singh With: Henry Cavill, Mickey Rourke, John Hurt
388.Outline: Theseus is a mortal man chosen by Zeus to lead the fight against the ruthless King Hyperion, who is on a rampage across Greece to obtain a weapon that can destroy humanity.

389.Name: Shrek the Third
389.Credit: Dir: Chris Miller, Raman Hui With: Mike Myers, Cameron Diaz, Eddie Murphy
389.Outline: When his new father-in-law, King Harold falls ill, Shrek is looked at as the heir to the land of Far, Far Away. Not one to give up his beloved swamp, Shrek recruits his friends Donkey and Puss in Boots to install the rebellious Artie as the new king. Princess Fiona, however, rallies a band of royal girlfriends to fend off a coup d'etat by the jilted Prince Charming.

390.Name: Mystery Men
390.Credit: Dir: Kinka Usher With: Ben Stiller, Janeane Garofalo, William H. Macy
390.Outline: A group of inept amateur superheroes must try to save the day when a supervillian threatens to destroy a major superhero and the city.

391.Name: Mr. Popper's Penguins
391.Credit: Dir: Mark Waters With: Jim Carrey, Carla Gugino, Angela Lansbury
391.Outline: The life of a businessman begins to change after he inherits six penguins, and as he transforms his apartment into a winter wonderland, his professional side starts to unravel.

392.Name: Van Helsing
392.Credit: Dir: Stephen Sommers With: Hugh Jackman, Kate Beckinsale, Richard Roxburgh
392.Outline: The notorious monster hunter is sent to Transylvania to stop Count Dracula who is using Dr. Frankenstein's research and a werewolf for some sinister purpose.

393.Name: Nim's Island
393.Credit: Dir: Jennifer Flackett, Mark Levin With: Jodie Foster, Gerard Butler, Abigail Breslin
393.Outline: A young girl inhabits an isolated island with her scientist father and communicates with a reclusive author of the novel she's reading.

394.Name: Casper
394.Credit: Dir: Brad Silberling With: Bill Pullman, Christina Ricci, Cathy Moriarty
394.Outline: A paranormal expert and his daughter bunk in an abandoned house populated by 3 mischievous ghosts and one friendly one.

395.Name: How the Grinch Stole Christmas
395.Credit: Dir: Ron Howard With: Jim Carrey, Taylor Momsen, Kelley
395.Outline: On the outskirts of Whoville, there lives a green, revenge-seeking Grinch who plans on ruining the Christmas holiday for all of the citizens of the town.

396.Name: Arthur and the Invisibles
396.Credit: Dir: Luc Besson With: Freddie Highmore, Mia Farrow, Madonna
396.Outline: Ten-year-old Arthur, in a bid to save his grandfather's house from being demolished, goes looking for some much-fabled hidden treasure in the land of the Minimoys, a tiny people living in harmony with nature.

397.Name: Valhalla Rising
397.Credit: Dir: Nicolas Winding Refn With: Mads Mikkelsen, Maarten Stevenson, Alexander Morton
397.Outline: 1000 AD, for years, One Eye, a mute warrior of supernatural strength, has been held prisoner by the Norse chieftain Barde...

398.Name: Teen Wolf
398.Credit: Dir: Rod Daniel With: Michael J. Fox, James Hampton, Susan Ursitti
398.Outline: A struggling high school student with problems discovers that his family has an unusual pedigree when he finds himself turning into a werewolf.

399.Name: The Last Witch Hunter
399.Credit: Dir: Breck Eisner With: Vin Diesel, Rose Leslie, Elijah Wood
399.Outline: The last witch hunter is all that stands between humanity and the combined forces of the most horrifying witches in history.

400.Name: Into the Woods
400.Credit: Dir: Rob Marshall With: Anna Kendrick, Meryl Streep, Chris Pine
400.Outline: A witch tasks a childless baker and his wife with procuring magical items from classic fairy tales to reverse the curse put on their family tree.

401.Name: The Mortal Instruments: City of Bones
401.Credit: Dir: Harald Zwart With: Lily Collins, Jamie Campbell Bower, Robert Sheehan
401.Outline: When her mother disappears, Clary Fray learns that she descends from a line of warriors who protect our world from demons. She joins forces with others like her and heads into a dangerous alternate New York called the Shadow World.

402.Name: Bedazzled
402.Credit: Dir: Harold Ramis With: Brendan Fraser, Elizabeth Hurley, Frances O'Connor
402.Outline: Hopeless dweeb Elliot Richards is granted 7 wishes by the devil to snare Allison, the girl of his dreams, in exchange for his soul.

403.Name: Cirque du Freak: The Vampire's Assistant
403.Credit: Dir: Paul Weitz With: Chris Massoglia, John C. Reilly, Salma Hayek
403.Outline: Teenager, Darren Shan, meets a mysterious man at a freak show who turns out to be a Vampire. After a series of events Darren must leave his normal life and go on the road with the Cirque Du Freak and become a Vampire.

404.Name: Night at the Museum: Battle of the Smithsonian
404.Credit: Dir: Shawn Levy With: Ben Stiller, Owen Wilson, Amy Adams
404.Outline: Security guard Larry Daley infiltrates the Smithsonian Institution in order to rescue Jedediah and Octavius, who have been shipped to the museum by mistake.

405.Name: Abraham Lincoln: Vampire Hunter
405.Credit: Dir: Timur Bekmambetov With: Benjamin Walker, Rufus Sewell, Dominic Cooper
405.Outline: Abraham Lincoln, the 16th President of the United States, discovers vampires are planning to take over the United States. He makes it his mission to eliminate them.

406.Name: The Brothers Grimm
406.Credit: Dir: Terry Gilliam With: Matt Damon, Heath Ledger, Monica Bellucci
406.Outline: Will and Jake Grimm are traveling con-artists who encounter a genuine fairy-tale curse which requires true courage instead of their usual bogus exorcisms.

407.Name: Percy Jackson & the Olympians: The Lightning Thief
407.Credit: Dir: Chris Columbus With: Logan Lerman, Kevin McKidd, Steve Coogan
407.Outline: A teenager discovers he's the descendant of a Greek god and sets out on an adventure to settle an on-going battle between the gods.

408.Name: Shallow Hal
408.Credit: Dir: Bobby Farrelly, Peter Farrelly With: Jack Black, Gwyneth Paltrow, Jason Alexander
408.Outline: A shallow man falls in love with a 300 pound woman because of her "inner beauty".

409.Name: Stuart Little
409.Credit: Dir: Rob Minkoff With: Michael J. Fox, Geena Davis, Hugh Laurie
409.Outline: The Little family adopt a charming young mouse named Stuart, but the family cat wants rid of him.

410.Name: Percy Jackson: Sea of Monsters
410.Credit: Dir: Thor Freudenthal With: Logan Lerman, Alexandra Daddario, Brandon T. Jackson
410.Outline: In order to restore their dying safe haven, the son of Poseidon and his friends embark on a quest to the Sea of Monsters to find the mythical Golden Fleece while trying to stop an ancient evil from rising.

411.Name: The Ant Bully
411.Credit: Dir: John A. Davis With: Paul Giamatti, Nicolas Cage, Julia Roberts
411.Outline: After Lucas Nickle floods an ant colony with his watergun, he's magically shrunken down to insect size and sentenced to hard labor in the ruins.

412.Name: Blade: Trinity
412.Genre: Action | Adventure | Fantasy | Horror | Sci-Fi | Thriller
412.Credit: Dir: David S. Goyer With: Wesley Snipes, Kris Kristofferson, Parker Posey
412.Outline: Blade, now a wanted man by the FBI, must join forces with the Nightstalkers to face his most challenging enemy yet: Dracula.

413.Name: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
413.Credit: Dir: Jonathan Liebesman With: Megan Fox, Will Arnett, William Fichtner
413.Outline: When a kingpin threatens New York City, a group of mutated turtle warriors must emerge from the shadows to protect their home.

414.Name: Pan
414.Credit: Dir: Joe Wright With: Levi Miller, Hugh Jackman, Garrett Hedlund
414.Outline: 12-year-old orphan Peter is spirited away to the magical world of Neverland, where he finds both fun and danger, and ultimately discovers his destiny -- to become the hero who will be forever known as Peter Pan.

415.Name: The Golden Child
415.Credit: Dir: Michael Ritchie With: Eddie Murphy, J.L. Reate, Charles Dance
415.Outline: A private detective specializing in missing children is charged with the task of finding a special child who dark forces want to eliminate.

416.Name: The Grudge
416.Credit: Dir: Takashi Shimizu With: Sarah Michelle Gellar, Jason Behr, Clea DuVall
416.Outline: An American nurse living and working in Tokyo is exposed to a mysterious supernatural curse, one that locks a person in a powerful rage before claiming their life and spreading to another victim.

417.Name: Asterix and Obelix vs. Caesar
417.Credit: Dir: Claude Zidi With: Christian Clavier, GÃ©rard Depardieu, Roberto Benigni
417.Outline: The well-known little village from the Asterix and Obelix-comic books is in trouble: It is the last place not controlled by Rome...

418.Name: Star Wars: The Clone Wars
418.Genre: Animation | Action | Adventure | Fantasy | Sci-Fi | Thriller
418.Credit: Dir: Dave Filoni With: Matt Lanter, Nika Futterman, Tom Kane
418.Outline: Anakin Skywalker and Ahsoka Tano must rescue the kidnapped son of Jabba the Hutt, but political intrigue complicates their mission.

419.Name: Conan the Destroyer
419.Credit: Dir: Richard Fleischer With: Arnold Schwarzenegger, Grace Jones, Olivia d'Abo
419.Outline: Conan leads a ragtag group of adventurers on a quest for a princess.

420.Name: Clash of the Titans
420.Credit: Dir: Louis Leterrier With: Sam Worthington, Liam Neeson, Ralph Fiennes
420.Outline: Perseus demigod, son of Zeus, battles the minions of the underworld to stop them from conquering heaven and earth.

421.Name: The Wolfman
421.Credit: Dir: Joe Johnston With: Benicio Del Toro, Anthony Hopkins, Emily Blunt
421.Outline: Upon his return to his ancestral homeland, an American man is bitten, and subsequently cursed by, a werewolf.

422.Name: The Cobbler
422.Credit: Dir: Tom McCarthy With: Adam Sandler, Melonie Diaz, Steve Buscemi
422.Outline: A cobbler, bored of his every-day life, stumbles upon a magical heirloom that allows him to become other people and see the world in a different way.

423.Name: V/H/S
423.Credit: Dir: Matt Bettinelli-Olpin, David Bruckner With: Calvin Reeder, Lane Hughes, Adam Wingard
423.Outline: When a group of misfits is hired by an unknown third party to burglarize a desolate house and acquire a rare VHS tape, they discover more found footage than they bargained for.

424.Name: The League of Extraordinary Gentlemen
424.Credit: Dir: Stephen Norrington With: Sean Connery, Stuart Townsend, Peta Wilson
424.Outline: In an alternate Victorian Age world, a group of famous contemporary fantasy, SF and adventure characters team up on a secret mission.

425.Name: Rubber
425.Credit: Dir: Quentin Dupieux With: Stephen Spinella, Roxane Mesquida, Wings Hauser
425.Outline: A homicidal car tire, discovering it has destructive psionic power, sets its sights on a desert town once a mysterious woman becomes its obsession.

426.Name: Journey 2: The Mysterious Island
426.Genre: Action | Adventure | Comedy | Family | Fantasy | Sci-Fi
426.Credit: Dir: Brad Peyton With: Josh Hutcherson, Dwayne Johnson, Michael Caine
426.Outline: Sean Anderson partners with his mom's husband on a mission to find his grandfather, who is thought to be missing on a mythical island.

427.Name: Journey to the Center of the Earth
427.Credit: Dir: Eric Brevig With: Brendan Fraser, Josh Hutcherson, Anita Briem
427.Outline: On a quest to find out what happened to his missing brother, a scientist, his nephew and their mountain guide discover a fantastic and dangerous lost world in the center of the earth.

428.Name: Mortal Kombat
428.Credit: Dir: Paul W.S. Anderson With: Christopher Lambert, Robin Shou, Linden Ashby
428.Outline: Three unknowing martial artists are summoned to a mysterious island to compete in a tournament whose outcome will decide the fate of the world.

429.Name: Dracula: Dead and Loving It
429.Credit: Dir: Mel Brooks With: Leslie Nielsen, Mel Brooks, Peter MacNicol
429.Outline: Mel Brooks' parody of the classic vampire story and its famous film adaptations.

430.Name: Wrath of the Titans
430.Credit: Dir: Jonathan Liebesman With: Sam Worthington, Liam Neeson, Rosamund Pike
430.Outline: Perseus braves the treacherous underworld to rescue his father, Zeus, captured by his son, Ares, and brother Hades who unleash the ancient Titans upon the world.

431.Name: Ghosts of Girlfriends Past
431.Credit: Dir: Mark Waters With: Matthew McConaughey, Jennifer Garner, Emma Stone
431.Outline: While attending his brother's wedding, a serial womanizer is haunted by the ghosts of his past girlfriends.

432.Name: Jack
432.Credit: Dir: Francis Ford Coppola With: Robin Williams, Diane Lane, Brian Kerwin
432.Outline: Because of an unusual aging disorder that has aged him four times faster than a normal human being, a boy enters the fifth grade for the first time with the appearance of a 40 year old man.

433.Name: Lara Croft: Tomb Raider
433.Credit: Dir: Simon West With: Angelina Jolie, Jon Voight, Iain Glen
433.Outline: Video game adventuress Lara Croft comes to life in a movie where she races against time and villains to recover powerful ancient artifacts.

434.Name: Priest
434.Credit: Dir: Scott Stewart With: Paul Bettany, Cam Gigandet, Maggie Q
434.Outline: A priest disobeys church law to track down the vampires who kidnapped his niece.

435.Name: Race to Witch Mountain
435.Genre: Action | Adventure | Family | Fantasy | Sci-Fi | Thriller
435.Credit: Dir: Andy Fickman With: Dwayne Johnson, Carla Gugino, AnnaSophia Robb
435.Outline: A Las Vegas cabbie enlists the help of a UFO expert to protect two siblings with paranormal powers from the clutches of an organization that wants to use the kids for their nefarious plans.

436.Name: Unfriended
436.Credit: Dir: Levan Gabriadze With: Heather Sossaman, Matthew Bohrer, Courtney Halverson
436.Outline: A group of online chat room friends find themselves haunted by a mysterious, supernatural force using the account of their dead friend.

437.Name: End of Days
437.Credit: Dir: Peter Hyams With: Arnold Schwarzenegger, Gabriel Byrne, Robin Tunney
437.Outline: At the end of the century, Satan visits New York in search of a bride. It's up to an ex-cop who now runs an elite security outfit to stop him.

438.Name: Child's Play 2
438.Credit: Dir: John Lafia With: Alex Vincent, Jenny Agutter, Gerrit Graham
438.Outline: While Andy's mother is admitted to a psychiatric hospital, the young boy is placed in foster care, and Chucky, determined to claim Andy's soul, is not far behind.

439.Name: Lady in the Water
439.Credit: Dir: M. Night Shyamalan With: Paul Giamatti, Bryce Dallas Howard, Jeffrey Wright
439.Outline: Apartment building superintendent Cleveland Heep rescues what he thinks is a young woman from the pool he maintains. When he discovers that she is actually a character from a bedtime story who is trying to make the journey back to her home, he works with his tenants to protect his new friend from the creatures that are determined to keep her in our world.

440.Name: Michael
440.Credit: Dir: Nora Ephron With: John Travolta, Andie MacDowell, William Hurt
440.Outline: Two tabloid reporters checking out a report of the Archangel Michael living with an old woman find that it's true. But that's not the only surprise.

441.Name: Fred Claus
441.Credit: Dir: David Dobkin With: Vince Vaughn, Paul Giamatti, Elizabeth Banks
441.Outline: Fred Claus, Santa's bitter older brother, is forced to move to the North Pole.

442.Name: R.I.P.D.
442.Credit: Dir: Robert Schwentke With: Ryan Reynolds, Jeff Bridges, Mary-Louise Parker
442.Outline: A recently slain cop joins a team of undead police officers working for the Rest in Peace Department and tries to find the man who murdered him.

443.Name: Mirror Mirror
443.Credit: Dir: Tarsem Singh With: Lily Collins, Julia Roberts, Armie Hammer
443.Outline: An evil queen steals control of a kingdom and an exiled princess enlists the help of seven resourceful rebels to win back her birthright.

444.Name: Vampire Academy
444.Credit: Dir: Mark Waters With: Zoey Deutch, Lucy Fry, Danila Kozlovsky
444.Outline: Rose Hathaway is a Dhampir, half human-half vampire, a guardian of the Moroi, peaceful, mortal vampires living discreetly within our world. Her calling is to protect the Moroi from bloodthirsty, immortal Vampires, the Strigoi.

445.Name: Beastly
445.Credit: Dir: Daniel Barnz With: Alex Pettyfer, Vanessa Hudgens, Mary-Kate Olsen
445.Outline: A modern-day take on the "Beauty and the Beast" tale where a New York teen is transformed into a hideous monster in order to find true love.

446.Name: Don't Be Afraid of the Dark
446.Credit: Dir: Troy Nixey With: Katie Holmes, Guy Pearce, Bailee Madison
446.Outline: A young girl sent to live with her father and his new girlfriend believes that she has released creatures from a sealed ash pit in the basement of her new home.

447.Name: Your Highness
447.Credit: Dir: David Gordon Green With: Danny McBride, Natalie Portman, James Franco
447.Outline: When Prince Fabious's bride is kidnapped, he goes on a quest to rescue her... accompanied by his lazy useless brother Thadeous.

448.Name: The Box
448.Credit: Dir: Richard Kelly With: Cameron Diaz, James Marsden, Frank Langella
448.Outline: A small wooden box arrives on the doorstep of a married couple, who know that opening it will grant them a million dollars and kill someone they don't know.

449.Name: Buffy the Vampire Slayer
449.Credit: Dir: Fran Rubel Kuzui With: Kristy Swanson, Donald Sutherland, Paul Reubens
449.Outline: A flighty teenage girl learns that she is her generation's destined battler of vampires.

450.Name: The Twilight Saga: Breaking Dawn - Part 2
450.Credit: Dir: Bill Condon With: Kristen Stewart, Robert Pattinson, Taylor Lautner
450.Outline: After the birth of Renesmee, the Cullens gather other vampire clans in order to protect the child from a false allegation that puts the family in front of the Volturi.

451.Name: The Santa Clause 2
451.Credit: Dir: Michael Lembeck With: Tim Allen, Spencer Breslin, Elizabeth Mitchell
451.Outline: Scott Calvin has been a humble Santa Claus for nearly ten years, but it might come to an end if he doesn't find a Mrs. Claus.

452.Name: The Omen
452.Credit: Dir: John Moore With: Liev Schreiber, Julia Stiles, Seamus Davey-Fitzpatrick
452.Outline: A remake of the horror classic The Omen , an American official realizes that his young son may literally be the devil incarnate.

453.Name: The Scorpion King
453.Credit: Dir: Chuck Russell With: Dwayne Johnson, Steven Brand, Michael Clarke Duncan
453.Outline: A desert warrior rises up against the evil army that is destroying his homeland. He captures the enemy's key sorcerer, takes her deep into the desert and prepares for a final showdown.

454.Name: Lara Croft Tomb Raider: The Cradle of Life
454.Credit: Dir: Jan de Bont With: Angelina Jolie, Gerard Butler, Chris Barrie
454.Outline: Adventuress Lara Croft goes on a quest to save the mythical Pandora's Box before an evil scientist and recruits a former Marine turned mercenary to assist her.

455.Name: The Smurfs
455.Credit: Dir: Raja Gosnell With: Hank Azaria, Katy Perry, Jonathan Winters
455.Outline: When the evil wizard Gargamel chases the tiny blue Smurfs out of their village, they tumble from their magical world into New York City.

456.Name: The Hot Chick
456.Credit: Dir: Tom Brady With: Rob Schneider, Rachel McAdams, Anna Faris
456.Outline: An attractive and popular teenager who is mean spirited toward others, finds herself in the body of an older man, and must find a way to get back to her original body.

457.Name: Seventh Son
457.Credit: Dir: Sergey Bodrov With: Ben Barnes, Julianne Moore, Jeff Bridges
457.Outline: When Mother Malkin, the queen of evil witches, escapes the pit she was imprisoned in by professional monster hunter Spook decades ago and kills his apprentice, he recruits young Tom, the seventh son of the seventh son, to help him.

458.Name: Bulletproof Monk
458.Credit: Dir: Paul Hunter With: Yun-Fat Chow, Seann William Scott, Jaime King
458.Outline: Based on the very underground comic book, a Tibetan monk becomes a mentor to a young street kid whom he can teach to protect a scroll.

459.Name: Drive Angry
459.Credit: Dir: Patrick Lussier With: Nicolas Cage, Amber Heard, William Fichtner
459.Outline: A vengeful father escapes from hell and chases after the men who killed his daughter and kidnapped his granddaughter.

460.Name: Teeth
460.Credit: Dir: Mitchell Lichtenstein With: Jess Weixler, John Hensley, Josh Pais
460.Outline: Still a stranger to her own body, a high school student discovers she has a physical advantage when she becomes the object of male violence.

461.Name: The Smurfs 2
461.Credit: Dir: Raja Gosnell With: Neil Patrick Harris, Jayma Mays, Katy Perry
461.Outline: The Smurfs team up with their human friends to rescue Smurfette, who has been kidnapped by Gargamel since she knows a secret spell that can turn the evil sorcerer's newest creation - creatures called the Naughties - into real Smurfs.

462.Name: Stuart Little 2
462.Credit: Dir: Rob Minkoff With: Michael J. Fox, Geena Davis, Hugh Laurie
462.Outline: Stuart and Snowbell set out across town to rescue a friend.

463.Name: Red Riding Hood
463.Credit: Dir: Catherine Hardwicke With: Amanda Seyfried, Lukas Haas, Gary Oldman
463.Outline: Set in a medieval village that is haunted by a werewolf, a young girl falls for an orphaned woodcutter, much to her family's displeasure.

464.Name: The Last Legion
464.Credit: Dir: Doug Lefler With: Colin Firth, Ben Kingsley, Aishwarya Rai Bachchan
464.Outline: As the Roman empire crumbles, young Romulus Augustus flees the city and embarks on a perilous voyage to Britain to track down a legion of supporters.

465.Name: Evan Almighty
465.Credit: Dir: Tom Shadyac With: Steve Carell, Morgan Freeman, Lauren Graham
465.Outline: God contacts Congressman Evan Baxter and tells him to build an ark in preparation for a great flood.

466.Name: Batman Forever
466.Credit: Dir: Joel Schumacher With: Val Kilmer, Tommy Lee Jones, Jim Carrey
466.Outline: Batman must battle Two-Face and The Riddler with help of an amourous psychologist and a young circus acrobat who becomes his sidekick, Robin.

467.Name: Season of the Witch
467.Credit: Dir: Dominic Sena With: Nicolas Cage, Ron Perlman, Claire Foy
467.Outline: 14th-century knights transport a suspected witch to a monastery, where monks deduce her powers could be the source of the Black Plague.

468.Name: A Nightmare on Elm Street 2: Freddy's Revenge
468.Credit: Dir: Jack Sholder With: Robert Englund, Mark Patton, Kim Myers
468.Outline: A teenage boy is haunted in his dreams by Freddy Krueger who is out to possess him to continue his murdering in the real world.

469.Name: Bride of Chucky
469.Credit: Dir: Ronny Yu With: Jennifer Tilly, Brad Dourif, Katherine Heigl
469.Outline: Chucky, the doll possessed by a serial killer, discovers the perfect mate to kill and revive into the body of another doll.

470.Name: Masters of the Universe
470.Credit: Dir: Gary Goddard With: Dolph Lundgren, Frank Langella, Meg Foster
470.Outline: A prince turned warrior named He-Man battles against the dark lord Skeletor on the planet Eternia. He-Man and his comrades arrive on Earth and discover two teenage lovers to find the magical Cosmic Key.

471.Name: Just My Luck
471.Credit: Dir: Donald Petrie With: Lindsay Lohan, Chris Pine, Samaire Armstrong
471.Outline: Manhattanite Ashley is known to many as the luckiest woman around. After a chance encounter with a down-and-out young man, however, she realizes that she's swapped her fortune for his.

472.Name: Doctor Dolittle
472.Credit: Dir: Betty Thomas With: Eddie Murphy, Peter Boyle, Ossie Davis
472.Outline: A Doctor finds out that he can understand what animals are saying. And the animals find out that he understands.

473.Name: Little Nicky
473.Credit: Dir: Steven Brill With: Adam Sandler, Patricia Arquette, Harvey Keitel
473.Outline: After two of the devil's three sons escape Hell to wreak havoc on Earth, the devil must send his third son, the mild-mannered Nicky, to bring them back before it's too late.

474.Name: The Covenant
474.Credit: Dir: Renny Harlin With: Steven Strait, Sebastian Stan, Toby Hemingway
474.Outline: Four young men who belong to a supernatural legacy are forced to battle a fifth power long thought to have died out. Another great force they must contend with is the jealousy and suspicion that threatens to tear them apart.

475.Name: Aquamarine
475.Credit: Dir: Elizabeth Allen Rosenbaum With: Emma Roberts, Joanna 'JoJo' Levesque, Sara Paxton
475.Outline: Two teenage girls discover a mermaid in their beach club's swimming pool.

476.Name: Alvin and the Chipmunks
476.Credit: Dir: Tim Hill With: Jason Lee, David Cross, Cameron Richardson
476.Outline: A struggling songwriter named Dave Seville finds success when he comes across a trio of singing chipmunks: mischievous leader Alvin, brainy Simon, and chubby, impressionable Theodore.

477.Name: The Mummy: Tomb of the Dragon Emperor
477.Credit: Dir: Rob Cohen With: Brendan Fraser, Jet Li, Maria Bello
477.Outline: In the Far East, Alex O'Connell, the son of famed mummy fighters Rick and Evy O'Connell, unearths the mummy of the first Emperor of Qin -- a shape-shifting entity cursed by a witch centuries ago.

478.Name: Queen of the Damned
478.Credit: Dir: Michael Rymer With: Aaliyah, Stuart Townsend, Marguerite Moreau
478.Outline: The vampire Lestat becomes a rock star whose music wakes up the queen of all vampires.

479.Name: Ghost Rider
479.Credit: Dir: Mark Steven Johnson With: Nicolas Cage, Eva Mendes, Sam Elliott
479.Outline: Stunt motorcyclist Johnny Blaze gives up his soul to become a hellblazing vigilante, to fight against power hungry Blackheart, the son of the devil himself.

480.Name: Twilight
480.Credit: Dir: Catherine Hardwicke With: Kristen Stewart, Robert Pattinson, Billy Burke
480.Outline: A teenage girl risks everything when she falls in love with a vampire.

481.Name: Legion
481.Credit: Dir: Scott Stewart With: Paul Bettany, Dennis Quaid, Charles S. Dutton
481.Outline: When a group of strangers at a dusty roadside diner come under attack by demonic forces, their only chance for survival lies with an archangel named, Michael, who informs a pregnant waitress that their unborn child is humanity's last hope.

482.Name: Conan the Barbarian
482.Credit: Dir: Marcus Nispel With: Jason Momoa, Ron Perlman, Rose McGowan
482.Outline: A vengeful barbarian warrior sets off to get his revenge on the evil warlord who attacked his village and murdered his father when he was a boy.

483.Name: Cats & Dogs
483.Credit: Dir: Lawrence Guterman With: Alec Baldwin, Tobey Maguire, Jeff Goldblum
483.Outline: A look at the top-secret, high-tech espionage war going on between cats and dogs, which their human owners are blissfully unaware of.

484.Name: I, Frankenstein
484.Credit: Dir: Stuart Beattie With: Aaron Eckhart, Bill Nighy, Miranda Otto
484.Outline: Frankenstein's creature finds himself caught in an all-out, centuries old war between two immortal clans.

485.Name: The Medallion
485.Credit: Dir: Gordon Chan With: Jackie Chan, Lee Evans, Claire Forlani
485.Outline: A Hong Kong detective suffers a fatal accident involving a mysterious medallion and is transformed into an immortal warrior with superhuman powers.

486.Name: Jennifer's Body
486.Credit: Dir: Karyn Kusama With: Megan Fox, Amanda Seyfried, Adam Brody
486.Outline: A newly possessed high school cheerleader turns into a succubus who specializes in killing her male classmates. Can her best friend put an end to the horror?

487.Name: G-Force
487.Genre: Action | Adventure | Comedy | Family | Fantasy | Sci-Fi
487.Credit: Dir: Hoyt Yeatman With: Will Arnett, PenÃ©lope Cruz, Zach Galifianakis
487.Outline: A specially trained squad of guinea pigs is dispatched to stop a diabolical billionaire from taking over the world.

488.Name: Eragon
488.Credit: Dir: Stefen Fangmeier With: Ed Speleers, Sienna Guillory, Jeremy Irons
488.Outline: In his homeland of Alagaesia, a farm boy happens upon a dragon's egg -- a discovery that leads him on a predestined journey where he realizes he's the one person who can defend his home against an evil king.

489.Name: 10,000 BC
489.Credit: Dir: Roland Emmerich With: Camilla Belle, Steven Strait, Marco Khan
489.Outline: A prehistoric epic that follows a young mammoth hunter's journey through uncharted territory to secure the future of his tribe.

490.Name: A Haunted House
490.Credit: Dir: Michael Tiddes With: Marlon Wayans, Essence Atkins, Marlene Forte
490.Outline: Malcolm and Kisha move into their dream home, but soon learn a demon also resides there. When Kisha becomes possessed, Malcolm - determined to keep his sex life on track - turns to a priest, a psychic, and a team of ghost-busters for help.

491.Name: Tooth Fairy
491.Credit: Dir: Michael Lembeck With: Dwayne Johnson, Ashley Judd, Julie Andrews
491.Outline: A bad deed on the part of a tough minor-league hockey player results in an unusual sentence: He must serve one week as a real-life tooth fairy.

492.Name: Garfield: A Tail of Two Kitties
492.Credit: Dir: Tim Hill With: Breckin Meyer, Jennifer Love Hewitt, Billy Connolly
492.Outline: Jon and Garfield visit the United Kingdom, where a case of mistaken cat identity finds Garfield ruling over a castle. His reign is soon jeopardized by the nefarious Lord Dargis, who has designs on the estate.

493.Name: Toys
493.Credit: Dir: Barry Levinson With: Robin Williams, Michael Gambon, Joan Cusack
493.Outline: When a military general inherits a toy making company and begins making war toys, his employees band together to stop him before he ruins the name of Zevo Toys forever.

494.Name: Paranormal Activity: The Marked Ones
494.Credit: Dir: Christopher Landon With: Andrew Jacobs, Jorge Diaz, Gabrielle Walsh
494.Outline: When a young man becomes the target of a malevolent entity, he must uncover its true intentions before it takes complete control of him.

495.Name: Red Sonja
495.Credit: Dir: Richard Fleischer With: Arnold Schwarzenegger, Brigitte Nielsen, Sandahl Bergman
495.Outline: A vengeful woman sets out to retrieve a magic orb from an evil queen whom she vows vengeance upon after the evil queen slain her family and her loyal warriors raped her.

496.Name: Garfield
496.Credit: Dir: Peter Hewitt With: Breckin Meyer, Jennifer Love Hewitt, Stephen Tobolowsky
496.Outline: Jon Arbuckle buys a second pet, a dog named Odie. However, Odie is then abducted and it is up to Jon's cat, Garfield, to find and rescue the canine.

497.Name: Scooby-Doo 2: Monsters Unleashed
497.Genre: Adventure | Comedy | Family | Fantasy | Horror | Mystery
497.Credit: Dir: Raja Gosnell With: Freddie Prinze Jr., Sarah Michelle Gellar, Matthew Lillard
497.Outline: Mystery Inc. must save Coolsville from an attack of past unmasked monsters brought to life by an evil masked figure trying to "unmask" the gang.

498.Name: The Twilight Saga: Eclipse
498.Credit: Dir: David Slade With: Kristen Stewart, Robert Pattinson, Taylor Lautner
498.Outline: As a string of mysterious killings grips Seattle, Bella, whose high school graduation is fast approaching, is forced to choose between her love for vampire Edward and her friendship with werewolf Jacob.

499.Name: The Haunted Mansion
499.Credit: Dir: Rob Minkoff With: Eddie Murphy, Marsha Thomason, Jennifer Tilly
499.Outline: A realtor and his wife and children are summoned to a mansion, which they soon discover is haunted, and while they attempt to escape, he learns an important lesson about the family he has neglected.

500.Name: Gulliver's Travels
500.Credit: Dir: Rob Letterman With: Jack Black, Emily Blunt, Jason Segel
500.Outline: Travel writer Lemuel Gulliver takes an assignment in Bermuda, but ends up on the island of Liliput, where he towers over its tiny citizens.

501.Name: Seed of Chucky
501.Credit: Dir: Don Mancini With: Jennifer Tilly, Brad Dourif, John Waters
501.Outline: Chucky and Tiffany are resurrected by their innocent son, Glen, and hit Hollywood, where a movie depicting the killer dolls' murder spree is underway.

502.Name: The Haunting
502.Credit: Dir: Jan de Bont With: Liam Neeson, Catherine Zeta-Jones, Owen Wilson
502.Outline: When Eleanor, Theo, and Luke decide to take part in a sleep study at a huge mansion they get more than they bargained for when Dr. Marrow tells them of the house's ghostly past.

503.Name: The Phantom
503.Credit: Dir: Simon Wincer With: Billy Zane, Kristy Swanson, Treat Williams
503.Outline: The Phantom, descendent of a line of African superheroes, travels to New York City to thwart a wealthy criminal genius from obtaining three magic skulls which would give him the secret to ultimate power.

504.Name: The Twilight Saga: Breaking Dawn - Part 1
504.Credit: Dir: Bill Condon With: Kristen Stewart, Robert Pattinson, Taylor Lautner
504.Outline: The Quileutes close in on expecting parents Edward and Bella, whose unborn child poses a threat to the Wolf Pack and the towns people of Forks.

505.Name: Dracula 2000
505.Credit: Dir: Patrick Lussier With: Gerard Butler, Justine Waddell, Jonny Lee Miller
505.Outline: A group of thieves break into a chamber expecting to find paintings, but instead they release the count himself, who travels to New Orleans to find his nemesis' daughter, Mary Van Helsing.

506.Name: The Spirit
506.Credit: Dir: Frank Miller With: Gabriel Macht, Samuel L. Jackson, Scarlett Johansson
506.Outline: Rookie cop Denny Colt returns from the beyond as The Spirit, a hero whose mission is to fight against the bad forces in Central City.

507.Name: The Flintstones
507.Credit: Dir: Brian Levant With: John Goodman, Rick Moranis, Rosie O'Donnell
507.Outline: In this live-action feature of the cartoon show, Fred Flintstone finally gets the job he's always wanted, but it may just come at a price.

508.Name: Bewitched
508.Credit: Dir: Nora Ephron With: Nicole Kidman, Will Ferrell, Shirley MacLaine
508.Outline: Thinking he can overshadow an unknown actress in the part, an egocentric actor unknowingly gets a witch cast in an upcoming television remake of the classic sitcom Bewitched .

509.Name: Elektra
509.Credit: Dir: Rob Bowman With: Jennifer Garner, Goran Visnjic, Will Yun Lee
509.Outline: Elektra the warrior survives a near-death experience, becomes an assassin-for-hire, and tries to protect her two latest targets, a single father and his young daughter, from a group of supernatural assassins.

510.Name: Black Knight
510.Credit: Dir: Gil Junger With: Martin Lawrence, Marsha Thomason, Tom Wilkinson
510.Outline: Martin Lawrence plays Jamal, an employee in Medieval World amusement park. After sustaining a blow to the head, he awakens to find himself in 14th century England.

511.Name: Herbie Fully Loaded
511.Genre: Adventure | Comedy | Family | Fantasy | Romance | Sport
511.Credit: Dir: Angela Robinson With: Lindsay Lohan, Michael Keaton, Cheryl Hines
511.Outline: Maggie Peyton, the new owner of Number 53 - the free-wheelin' Volkswagen bug with a mind of its own - puts the car through its paces on the road to becoming a NASCAR competitor.

512.Name: Jonah Hex
512.Credit: Dir: Jimmy Hayward With: Josh Brolin, Megan Fox, John Malkovich
512.Outline: The U.S. military makes a scarred bounty hunter with warrants on his own head an offer he cannot refuse: in exchange for his freedom, he must stop a terrorist who is ready to unleash Hell on Earth.

513.Name: Dr. Dolittle 2
513.Credit: Dir: Steve Carr With: Eddie Murphy, Cedric the Entertainer, Kristen Wilson
513.Outline: Dolittle must save a forest and a bear's life.

514.Name: The Twilight Saga: New Moon
514.Credit: Dir: Chris Weitz With: Kristen Stewart, Robert Pattinson, Taylor Lautner
514.Outline: Edward leaves Bella after an attack that nearly claimed her life, and in her depression she falls into yet another paranormal relationship- this time with werewolf Jacob Black.

515.Name: Alvin and the Chipmunks: The Squeakquel
515.Credit: Dir: Betty Thomas With: Jason Lee, Zachary Levi, David Cross
515.Outline: The world famous singing pre-teen chipmunk trio return to contend with the pressures of school, celebrity, and a rival female music group known as The Chipettes.

516.Name: Ouija
516.Credit: Dir: Stiles White With: Olivia Cooke, Ana Coto, Daren Kagasoff
516.Outline: A group of friends must confront their most terrifying fears when they awaken the dark powers of an ancient spirit board.

517.Name: Ghost Rider: Spirit of Vengeance
517.Credit: Dir: Mark Neveldine, Brian Taylor With: Nicolas Cage, CiarÃ¡n Hinds, Idris Elba
517.Outline: As Johnny Blaze hides out in Eastern Europe, he is called upon to stop the devil, who is trying to take human form.

518.Name: The Last Airbender
518.Credit: Dir: M. Night Shyamalan With: Noah Ringer, Nicola Peltz, Jackson Rathbone
518.Outline: Follows the adventures of Aang, a young successor to a long line of Avatars, who must master all four elements and stop the Fire Nation from enslaving the Water Tribes and the Earth Kingdom.

519.Name: The Legend of Hercules
519.Credit: Dir: Renny Harlin With: Kellan Lutz, Gaia Weiss, Scott Adkins
519.Outline: The origin story of the the mythical Greek hero. Betrayed by his stepfather, the King, and exiled and sold into slavery because of a forbidden love, Hercules must use his formidable powers to fight his way back to his rightful kingdom.

520.Name: Highlander II: The Quickening
520.Credit: Dir: Russell Mulcahy With: Christopher Lambert, Sean Connery, Virginia Madsen
520.Outline: In the future, Highlander Connor MacLeod must prevent the destruction of Earth under an anti-ozone shield.

521.Name: Super Mario Bros.
521.Credit: Dir: Annabel Jankel, Rocky Morton With: Bob Hoskins, John Leguizamo, Dennis Hopper
521.Outline: Two Brooklyn plumbers, Mario and Luigi, must travel to another dimension to rescue a princess from the evil dictator King Koopa and stop him from taking over the world.

522.Name: Book of Shadows: Blair Witch 2
522.Credit: Dir: Joe Berlinger With: Jeffrey Donovan, Stephen Barker Turner, Erica Leerhsen
522.Outline: A group of tourists arrive in Burkittsville, Maryland after seeing "The Blair Witch Project" to explore the mythology and phenomenon, only to come face to face with their own neuroses and possibly the witch herself.

523.Name: The Cat in the Hat
523.Credit: Dir: Bo Welch With: Mike Myers, Spencer Breslin, Dakota Fanning
523.Outline: Sally and Conrad are two bored kids whose life is turned up-side-down when a talking cat comes to visit them.

524.Name: In the Name of the King: A Dungeon Siege Tale
524.Credit: Dir: Uwe Boll With: Jason Statham, Ron Perlman, Ray Liotta
524.Outline: A man named Farmer sets out to rescue his kidnapped wife and avenge the death of his son -- two acts committed by the Krugs, a race of animal-warriors who are controlled by the evil Gallian.

525.Name: Batman & Robin
525.Credit: Dir: Joel Schumacher With: Arnold Schwarzenegger, George Clooney, Chris O'Donnell
525.Outline: Batman & Robin try to keep their relationship together even as they must stop Mr. Freeze and Poison Ivy from freezing Gotham City.

526.Name: Mortal Kombat: Annihilation
526.Credit: Dir: John R. Leonetti With: Robin Shou, Talisa Soto, James Remar
526.Outline: A group of martial arts warriors have only six days to save the Earth from an extra-dimensional invasion.

527.Name: Dungeons & Dragons
527.Credit: Dir: Courtney Solomon With: Justin Whalin, Jeremy Irons, Zoe McLellan
527.Outline: Profion, a tyrant, attempts to overthrow a peaceful kingdom ruled by a tough empress.

528.Name: Catwoman
528.Credit: Dir: Pitof With: Halle Berry, Sharon Stone, Benjamin Bratt
528.Outline: A shy woman, endowed with the speed, reflexes, and senses of a cat, walks a thin line between criminal and hero, even as a detective doggedly pursues her, fascinated by both of her personas.

529.Name: BloodRayne
529.Credit: Dir: Uwe Boll With: Kristanna Loken, Ben Kingsley, Michelle Rodriguez
529.Outline: In the 18th century, a vampire escapes from the freak show she once participated in and teams up with a group of vampire slayers to kill the man who raped her mother.

530.Name: Dragonball: Evolution
530.Credit: Dir: James Wong With: Justin Chatwin, James Marsters, Yun-Fat Chow
530.Outline: The young warrior Son Goku sets out on a quest, racing against time and the vengeful King Piccolo, to collect a set of seven magical orbs that will grant their wielder unlimited power.

531.Name: Son of the Mask
531.Credit: Dir: Lawrence Guterman With: Jamie Kennedy, Traylor Howard, Alan Cumming
531.Outline: Tim Avery, an aspiring cartoonist, finds himself in a predicament when his dog stumbles upon the mask of Loki. Then after conceiving an infant son "born of the mask", he discovers just how looney child raising can be.
